content:
I have a hypothesis (hz : (sin (x+y*I)) = 0) ( for x y : ‚Ñù). I want the hypothesis hz2 : normSq (sin (x+y*I)) = 0.
I know how to apply theorems to hypotheses. How do I apply a function (namely normSq) to both sides of a hypothesis?
That gets me most of the way there. Thanks!
Nicholas Wilson has marked this topic as resolved.
